services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Flexible packages for your event: design, render and pre-visualization; equipment rental; installation and operator; show programming and support.

items.title: Design & Previsualization
items.description: Concept, moodboard, CAD and renders. Technical plan (light, audio, rigging) and rider.

items.title: Rental & Installation
items.description: Intelligent lighting, LED, laser, smoke, PA line array, microphones, consoles.

items.title: Operation & Programming
items.description: Operators for live show, timecode, DMX, d3/Resolume, PA adjustment (Smaart).

vision.text1: We believe in transforming spaces through immersive light and sound experiences. Our vision is to push the boundaries of what's possible in event production, creating unforgettable moments that resonate with audiences long after the lights dim.
vision.text2: Every project is an opportunity to blend technical expertise with creative innovation, delivering experiences that elevate events from ordinary to extraordinary.
vision.imageSubtitle: Creating immersive experiences since day one

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team based in Malmö/CPH specialized in transforming spaces through light and sound. We work on turnkey projects or in collaboration with agencies, venues, and production companies. Security, timing, and clear budget.
features: Coverage: Skåne, Copenhagen and the rest of Sweden/Denmark.
Liability insurance and electrical certifications according to regulations.
